about_the_game:
Welcome to a retro-styled, arcade-inspired 2.5D helicopter game! This isn’t a serious flight simulator—instead, it features simplified physics and easy controls for pure, unfiltered fun. The retro vibe isn’t just about the minimalist visuals; it’s about straightforward, enjoyable gameplay. Remember those classic pick-up-and-play games with no complex storylines, just pure gaming joy? If so, you’ll love Rescue Heli RH407! And if you enjoy a challenge, you’ll also find puzzles to solve along the way—retro with a modern twist.

PICKING UP PEOPLE IS JUST THE BEGINNING

Once you’ve picked up your passengers, the real challenge begins. You’ll need to navigate carefully and deliver them safely to the heliport. Only after successfully landing will your score increase, allowing you to make progress toward your goal.

BEWARE OF OBSTACLES

Test your skills by navigating through increasingly tricky obstacles. With limited fuel, you’ll need to think fast and act even faster to avoid crashing and reach your destination in time!

FLIGHT SAFELY

Air acrobatics might seem fun, but don’t forget your passengers are not strapped in! Too much wild maneuvering could send them flying out of the helicopter. Also, remember that landing softly is just as important as flying—crashing to the ground might not only endanger the passengers but could lead to serious injuries or even death.

SIMPLE RULES, CHALLENGING FUN

  • Navigate the helicopter with precision.

  • Search for and collect people who are waiting for transport.

  • Safely bring them to the heliport.

  • Avoid reckless flying—passengers aren’t strapped in and could fall out.

  • Steer clear of hard landings—rough touchdowns can cause concussions and injuries to your passengers.

  • Be quick and efficient—your fuel is limited!

  • Puzels included - use designated spots to unlock access to closed areas. 

RADAR IS YOUR TRUSTY COMPANION

Use the radar to guide you:

  • Green dots represent people waiting to be rescued.

  • Red dots indicate fuel barrels.

PUZZLES IN THE GAME = "retro with a modern twist"

You can drop people off and pick them up again later. If you do this on a designated spot, doors to an otherwise inaccessible location will open. This mechanic allows you to gather more people - all while managing the pressure of burning fuel. You'll have to act fast and think strategically - a mix of arcade gameplay and puzzles that you’re bound to enjoy! This is what we mean by "retro with a modern twist"

OBSTACLES, SHADOWS, AND SPOTLIGHT!

Watch your altitude—flying too high will cause your helicopter to lose lift and descend rapidly. Be on the lookout for obstacles that might appear out of nowhere—some are hidden in the dark, so keep your spotlight on to spot them in time!

Certain obstacles require you to rely on your helicopter's subtle leaning indications for safe navigation. It might initially feel confusing, but don’t worry—you’ll get the hang of it. If not you, then who else?

LEVELS ARE NOT WHAT THEY SEEM

Don’t get too comfortable with your memory! Although levels might seem similar initially, they can change subtly or dramatically. So even if you think you know where the passengers are, you might be in for a surprise. Always stay alert and adapt!

NO SHOOTING, BUT PLENTY OF ADRENALINE

While this game doesn’t feature any shooting or combat, the tension is real. The black-and-white environment, crazy perspectives, shifting obstacles, and ever-present shadows create a thrilling atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

MY LITTLE HELP FOR GAMERS ;-)

In case of an out-of-fuel situation - you can PAUSE the game and move to MAIN MENU - you will not ruin your scores. Then you can restart the level without losing points. You can also do this in any other situation ;-)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4 LTE
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Snapdragon X Elite
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4 LTE
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (6 core with 3,5 Ghz) or Intel i5-10400F (6 core with 2,9 Ghz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX580 (8GB) or Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti (4GB) or Intel Arc A750 8GB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: An arcade game with a retro vibe. Navigate a helicopter in 2.5D and rescue people waiting for transport. Don't overdo the aerial acrobatics—passengers might fall out! Also, land softly! And be quick—you're running out of fuel. Puzzles with portals add a modern twist to the retro gameplay.
